workflow.name: XDR-AUTOMATION - Execute Playbook  End to End Use Case for 25189
workflow.title: XDR-AUTOMATION - Execute Playbook  End to End Use Case for 25189

properties.value:
{
  "module_targets": [
    {
      "module_type": "Darktrace RESPOND & DETECT",
      "external_id": "securex:ao:darktrace"
    }
  ],
  "module_targets_skip_list": [
    "securex:ao:darktrace"
  ],
  "workflow": {
    "unique_name": "definition_workflow_02CIND1E0LEJR5Pqi9w5VYnX9zbXBG6hcra",
    "name": "DarkTrace-For Playbook Execution",
    "title": "DarkTrace-For Playbook Execution",
    "type": "generic.workflow",
    "base_type": "workflow",
    "variables": null,
    "properties": {
      "atomic": {
        "is_atomic": false
      },
      "automation_rules": {
        "type": [
          "incident.rule_event"
        ]
      },
      "delete_workflow_instance": false,
      "display_name": "DarkTrace-For Playbook Execution",
      "runtime_user": {
        "target_default": true
      },
      "target": {
        "target_type": "web-service.endpoint",
        "target_id": "$module_target;Darktrace RESPOND & DETECT;securex:ao:darktrace$",
        "execute_on_workflow_target": true
      },
      "wf_metadata": {
        "coa": {
          "action": [
            "alert",
            "allow"
          ],
          "intent": "incident_response",
          "observable_types": [
            "domain",
            "email",
            "hostname",
            "ip",
            "ipv6",
            "md5",
            "sha1",
            "sha256",
            "url",
            "user",
            "amp_computer_guid",
            "certificate_common_name",
            "certificate_issuer",
            "certificate_serial",
            "cisco_cm_id",
            "cisco_mid",
            "cisco_uc_id",
            "cortex_agent_id",
            "crowdstrike_id",
            "cybereason_id",
            "darktrace_id",
            "device",
            "email_messageid",
            "email_subject",
            "file_name",
            "file_path",
            "imei",
            "imsi",
            "mac_address",
            "ms_machine_id",
            "mutex",
            "ngfw_id",
            "ngfw_name",
            "odns_identity",
            "odns_identity_label",
            "orbital_node_id",
            "pki_serial",
            "process_args",
            "process_hash",
            "process_name",
            "process_path",
            "process_username",
            "processor_id",
            "registry_key",
            "registry_name",
            "registry_path",
            "s1_agent_id",
            "serial_number",
            "swc_device_id",
            "trend_micro_id",
            "user_agent"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "object_type": "definition_workflow",
    "actions": [
      {
        "unique_name": "definition_activity_02CIND1FKCA9U26OL459I8qCef8BUdqSe24",
        "name": "HTTP Request",
        "title": "HTTP Request (Create Tag)",
        "type": "web-service.http_request",
        "base_type": "activity",
        "properties": {
          "action_timeout": 180,
          "allow_auto_redirect": true,
          "allow_headers_redirect": false,
          "body": "{\n  \"name\": \"test-tag-[$workflow.definition_workflow_02CIND1E0LEJR5Pqi9w5VYnX9zbXBG6hcra.output.start_time$]\",\n  \"data\": {}\n}",
          "continue_on_error_status_code": false,
          "continue_on_failure": true,
          "display_name": "HTTP Request (Create Tag)",
          "method": "POST",
          "relative_url": "/tags",
          "runtime_user": {
            "target_default": true
          },
          "skip_execution": false,
          "target": {
            "use_workflow_target": true
          }
        },
        "object_type": "definition_activity"
      },
      {
        "unique_name": "definition_activity_02CIND1G8SNOO293lhIHa6VnAt6QHbI0bnR",
        "name": "JSONPath Query",
        "title": "Fetch TagID",
        "type": "corejava.jsonpathquery",
        "base_type": "activity",
        "properties": {
          "action_timeout": 180,
          "continue_on_failure": true,
          "display_name": "Fetch TagID",
          "input_json": "[$activity.definition_activity_02CIND1FKCA9U26OL459I8qCef8BUdqSe24.output.response_body$]      ",
          "jsonpath_queries": [
            {
              "jsonpath_query": "$.tid",
              "jsonpath_query_name": "tag_ID",
              "jsonpath_query_type": "string",
              "zdate_type_format": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ"
            }
          ],
          "skip_execution": false
        },
        "object_type": "definition_activity"
      },
      {
        "unique_name": "definition_activity_02CIND1H0DAE92JcN946e1joDZ2qfEAfbpL",
        "name": "HTTP Request",
        "title": "HTTP Request (GET ALL Tags)",
        "type": "web-service.http_request",
        "base_type": "activity",
        "properties": {
          "action_timeout": 180,
          "allow_auto_redirect": true,
          "allow_headers_redirect": false,
          "continue_on_error_status_code": false,
          "continue_on_failure": true,
          "display_name": "HTTP Request (GET ALL Tags)",
          "method": "GET",
          "relative_url": "/tags",
          "runtime_user": {
            "target_default": true
          },
          "skip_execution": false,
          "target": {
            "use_workflow_target": true
          }
        },
        "object_type": "definition_activity"
      },
      {
        "unique_name": "definition_activity_02CIND1HPJ2BB045QPN6KtDhtXNIgWcOPE3",
        "name": "HTTP Request",
        "title": "HTTP Request (GET Tag by ID)",
        "type": "web-service.http_request",
        "base_type": "activity",
        "properties": {
          "action_timeout": 180,
          "allow_auto_redirect": true,
          "allow_headers_redirect": false,
          "continue_on_error_status_code": false,
          "continue_on_failure": true,
          "display_name": "HTTP Request (GET Tag by ID)",
          "method": "GET",
          "relative_url": "/tags/[$activity.definition_activity_02CIND1G8SNOO293lhIHa6VnAt6QHbI0bnR.output.jsonpath_queries.tag_ID$]",
          "runtime_user": {
            "target_default": true
          },
          "skip_execution": false,
          "target": {
            "use_workflow_target": true
          }
        },
        "object_type": "definition_activity"
      },
      {
        "unique_name": "definition_activity_02CIND1IGZC3G5s12WklowwQWj3Rp6esMCC",
        "name": "HTTP Request",
        "title": "HTTP Request (Delete Tag by ID)",
        "type": "web-service.http_request",
        "base_type": "activity",
        "properties": {
          "action_timeout": 180,
          "allow_auto_redirect": true,
          "allow_headers_redirect": false,
          "continue_on_error_status_code": false,
          "continue_on_failure": true,
          "display_name": "HTTP Request (Delete Tag by ID)",
          "method": "DELETE",
          "relative_url": "/tags/[$activity.definition_activity_02CIND1G8SNOO293lhIHa6VnAt6QHbI0bnR.output.jsonpath_queries.tag_ID$]",
          "runtime_user": {
            "target_default": true
          },
          "skip_execution": false,
          "target": {
            "use_workflow_target": true
          }
        },
        "object_type": "definition_activity"
      },
      {
        "unique_name": "definition_activity_02CINDKENSJR11fAOdSqvJx4kLqXJeJ176T",
        "name": "To Upper",
        "title": "To Upper",
        "type": "core.string2upper",
        "base_type": "activity",
        "properties": {
          "continue_on_failure": false,
          "display_name": "To Upper",
          "skip_execution": false,
          "source": "Module Integation Details -- \n\nAPI Name --\n[$workflow.definition_workflow_02CIND1E0LEJR5Pqi9w5VYnX9zbXBG6hcra.target.web-service endpoint.output.metadata.sx_module_info.api_name$]\n\nExternal ID -- \n[$workflow.definition_workflow_02CIND1E0LEJR5Pqi9w5VYnX9zbXBG6hcra.target.web-service endpoint.output.metadata.sx_module_info.external_id$]\n\nModule Type --\n[$workflow.definition_workflow_02CIND1E0LEJR5Pqi9w5VYnX9zbXBG6hcra.target.web-service endpoint.output.metadata.sx_module_info.module_type$]\n\nTarget URL --\n[$workflow.definition_workflow_02CIND1E0LEJR5Pqi9w5VYnX9zbXBG6hcra.target.web-service endpoint.output.metadata.sx_module_info.target_url$]\n\nRule Type Details --\n\n[$rule.incident rule_event.output.incident.id$]\n\n[$rule.incident rule_event.output.incident.scores.global$]\n\n[$rule.incident rule_event.output.incident.severity$]\n\n[$rule.incident rule_event.output.observables.data[0].type$]\n\n[$rule.incident rule_event.output.observables.data[0].value$]"
        },
        "object_type": "definition_activity"
      }
    ],
    "categories": [
      "category_1BMfMXSnJMyt5Ihqi7rWJr5N8cf"
    ]
  }
}

blocks.name: Parallel Branch
blocks.title: Playbook Execution When WF created from Template

properties.description:
Use Case -- This WF Needs to be run on Target named with "Playbook Target"
Create a Phase for all four Stages (Identification , Containment , Eradication and Recovery)
Create a Wf of Incident Response 
Create a task for playbook with wf id 
Also When Condition does not match wf fail to execute with 404 (Expected to Fail)
Create playbook and Publish
Assignment Rule with condition and map above playbook
Create a Incident which matches condition 
Go to response and execute Workflow
properties.display_name: Playbook Execution When WF created from Template

blocks.name: Parallel Branch
blocks.title: Playbook Execution For WF having Module Target and Var Ref in WF

properties.description:
Use Case -- This WF Needs to be run on Target named with "Playbook Target"
Create a Phase for all four Stages (Identification , Containment , Eradication and Recovery)
Enable the Module Integration for DarkTrace
Import  a Wf having Module Target and Variable reference in it 
Create a task for playbook with wf id 
Create playbook and Publish
Assignment Rule with condition and map above playbook
Create a Incident which matches condition 
Go to response and execute Workflow
properties.display_name: Playbook Execution For WF having Module Target and Var Ref in WF

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)
